name: Flormar Body Mist 200ML  Cotton Candy & Van
description: Savor the splendid scent of cotton candy and vanilla with Cotton Candy & Vanilla Body Mist! Vitamins A and E in Shea butter soothe the skin and protect its elasticity, thus allow it to feel refreshed. This body mist not only radiates a lovely scent, it also nourishes and moisturizes the body. Feel free to use Flormar body mist all day long whenever you please.

name: Flormar Body Mist 200ML  Creamy Coconut
description: Leave it to Creamy Coconut Shower Gel to take care of your body! The coconut extract in its formula will moisturize the skin and protect it from drying out. Thanks to its moisturizing effects, it prevents damage resulting from dry skin structure. Its special formula contains Vitamin E, glycerin and Hydroviton Plus, which nourish and protect the skin.

name: Flormar Body Mist 200ML  Fresh Citrus
description: Enjoy the refreshing feeling offered by lemon extract! Fresh Citrus Shower Gel not only nourishes and moisturizes the skin, it also prevents damage that dry skin is prone to. You will love using this shower gel that contains Vitamin C, lemon extract and potassium which renew and refresh the skin.

name: Flormar Body Mist 200ML  Juicy Mango
description: Give your body the care it deserves with Juicy Mango Shower Gel that nourishes the skin and has a magnificent scent! Flormar shower gel is enriched with Vitamins A, C and E and glycerin. This mango-scented shower gel nourishes, protects and moisturizes the skin and allows it to glow. You will enjoy using this dryness-preventing shower gel every time you take a shower.

name: Flormar Body Mist 200ML  Mixed Berries
description: Vitamins A, C and E in Mixed Berries Shower Gel will leave you feeling refreshed after each shower! Thanks to its special formula, Flormar shower gel nourishes, moisturizes and protects the skin. By protecting the skin from drying out, it helps prevent wrinkles resulting from dry skin and allows your body to look healthy.

name: Flormar Eyebrow Pencil 402 Brown
description: Eyebrow Pencil provides an intense color to create a natural and defined look on your eyebrows. You may use the brush on the lid to shape your eyebrows and achieve the best results. The vegetable oils in Flormar eyebrow pencil’s formula moisturize the skin and protect against the signs of early aging.Fill the gaps in your eyebrows using the pencil, and then comb with the brush on the lid to shape.

description: Eyebrow Pencil provides an intense color to create a natural and defined look on your eyebrows. You may use the brush on the lid to shape your eyebrows and achieve the best results. name: Flormar Eyeliner Pen  Black
description: It is very easy to use Eyeliner Pen with its practical package and special tip! Carbon Black pigment in its formula adds an intensity to the color black. Additionally, its water-based texture and its ability to draw fine lines will bring out your eyes in a natural way. You can easily create defined lines around your eyes and enjoy your striking look all day long.

description: It is very easy to use Eyeliner Pen with its practical package and special tip! Carbon Black pigment in its formula adds an intensity to the color black. name: Flormar Just Magic Kajal Liner Flormar
description: Make-up base is the first step of a long-lasting and glowing make-up. Illuminating Primer Make-Up Base protects and nourishes your skin with its special formula while offering the best skin make-up. Containing green tea extracts and Akai berry, rich in antioxidants, Flormar make-up base ensures a comfortable feel on your skin with a fine layer. It also protects the skin against the signs of early aging. After applying moisturizer and waiting for it to be absorbed (except for the eye area), you can apply Illuminating Primer Make-up Base on your face and neck area.

name: Flormar Precision Artliner  Black
description: Precision Artliner is easy to apply thanks to its flexible bristle brush. Helping you create a flawless line, Artliner will add intensity and definition to your eye make-up.Apply it by creating a straight line along your lash lines.

name: Flormar Roll N Go Liner Black
description: If you would like to effortlessly accentuate your eye shape, then you should definitely try Flormar Roll'n Go Liner! Offering a shiny and smooth finish in a single motion thanks to its roll-on applicator, Roll'n Go Liner is water and humidity-proof and maintains its intense black color throughout the day thanks to its smudge-free texture.

Flormar Smokey Eyeliner lasts all day long with its intense black color, soft and waterproof texture. Smokey eye make-up has never been easier! Thanks to almond oil and olive oil extracts in its formula, a healthy skin awaits you as well! In addition, Perfect Coverage Foundation protects the skin from harmful UV rays with SPF 15 in its formula. Perfect Coverage is suitable for all skin types.

name: Flormar Baked Powder 22 Marble Beige Gold
description: With Baked Powder your skin will be glowing all day long. Thanks to the natural ingredients in its formula, its glowing and silky texture, Flormar powder is in perfect harmony with your skin, Soft and velvety Flormar Baked Powder will create a healthy and fresh look on your skin. Baked Powder should be applied with a powder brush. It can be applied on the entire face, neck and decolette area.

name: Flormar Satin Touch Flormar Compact Powder  01 Porcelain
description: Satin Touch Compact Powder is a lightweight compact powder. If you'd like to achieve smooth skin, then you have to try Satin Touch Compact Powder! This product, which was designed to offer a semi-matte finish and conceal skin imperfections, is just right for you! Satin Touch Compact Powder, which prevents shine and offers silky smooth skin thanks to the texture changing amino acid in its formula, allows you to create a long-lasting and flawless look with its 6 different color options.

name: Flormar Compact Powder Wet & Dry  W01 Porcelain Rose
description: Wet and Dry Compact Powder is a compact powder that can be applied dry or wet. With its special silky texture, it is very easy to apply Flormar Wet & Dry compact powder to enjoy a velvety softness and smooth look. Its texture also controls the shine on your skin.You can apply it on your skin dry or wet. For high coverage, damp the accompanying latex sponge with water and apply starting from the center of your face and move towards outer edges. If you want to set your natural look or foundation make-up, use a powder brush. Wash and rinse the sponge after each application. Make sure the sponge is dry before you put it back into its package.
